colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009B (ZHES PA 'DI NI CHE BA JANG JONG WANG GI DGE BSKOS TZAS SANG NANG SO CHOS 'PHEL ZHES BYA BAS, ,THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BSOD NAMS RGYA MTSO'I MDZAD PA BZLOG BSGYUR SHIN TU BSKUL BA'I PHYIR, ,DA LAS CUNG RGYAS ZHIG BGYIS ZHES BSKUL BA LA GOS LTOG PAR, ,DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL BA BYUNG RGYAL DU SONG BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS @010A *, ,BGYIS PA'I NYES TSOGS KUN LHA MO 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA BYAMS SHING BZOD PAR GSOL,, ,,'BYOR GANG BGYIS PA KUN LA PHAN PA DANG BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,MANGGA LAM DGE'O,, ,,)
